The Worm with Roll Assault
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The Worm with Roll Assault
By Elf* on Wednesday, June 16, 2010 - 01:31 pm:

Now I'd like to find the topic I can't, but if memory serves correctly it came from an/the Offspring
Americana CD. After a horde of CD's making unreasonable expedition monsters, what I was looking for,
I came across a worm, which I was sort of pleased with. After reading up on this worm a while ago,
I've checked the techs on every single one of them, which was, up until this point, in vain. However,
this was the worm that is listed, and in case you're thinking that this is an entirely useless post
please bear in mind I'm on the PAL version, where I believe it hasn't been found yet. The CD was Un-
Led-Ed by Dread Zeppelin, and if you'd like any extra information on it then ask away.
